thread.title: Simon Buck
thread.title_full: Defender Bird Spikes reviewed by Simon Buck

author: Simon Buck
title: Simon Buck
text:
Arrived well packaged; spikes are sharp and strong; very easy to fit to guttering (fits easily around joints and guttering brackets); survived the very high winds of Thursday 23rd Feb. No pigeons trying to nest there, like last year, so far; but maybe it is a bit early to tell. However I am confident it will work! I can recommend this product without hesitation.
My tip: but one or two more lengths than you need and keep as spares- the postage will be the same.
